name: Antelope
spoiler: Trade 145,000 Hunting Task Points with Walter Jaeger.

name: Black Sheep
spoiler: Use Reins on a Black Sheep.

name: Blazebringer
spoiler: If you have lit all 10 basins on a successful Lightbearer event, you can ask Santa Claus for a very special present to receive this mount.

name: Blue Rolling Barrel
spoiler: Use a Beer Tap on a Super Cask while having a Decorative Blue Sheet in your inventory.

name: Bright Percht Sleigh
spoiler: Deliver a Percht Skull to Frosty.

name: Bright Percht Sleigh Variant
spoiler: Ask Frosty to upgrade a Bright Percht Sleigh by delivering another Percht Skull to him.

name: Cold Percht Sleigh
spoiler: Deliver a Percht Skull to Frosty.

name: Cold Percht Sleigh Variant
spoiler: Ask Frosty to upgrade a Cold Percht Sleigh by delivering another Percht Skull to him.

name: Crystal Wolf
spoiler: Use a Diapason on a Crystal Wolf.

name: Dark Percht Sleigh
spoiler: Deliver a Percht Skull to Frosty.

name: Dark Percht Sleigh Variant
spoiler: Ask Frosty to upgrade a Dark Percht Sleigh by delivering another Percht Skull to him.

name: Donkey
spoiler: Use a Bag of Apple Slices on a creature transformed into Donkey.

name: Dragonling
spoiler: Use Decorative Ribbon or Music Box on a Dragonling.

name: Draptor
spoiler: Use a Harness or a Music Box on a Draptor.

name: Dromedary
spoiler: Use a Fist on a Stick on a Dromedary.

name: Finished Bright Percht Sleigh
spoiler: Ask Frosty to upgrade a Bright Percht Sleigh Variant by delivering another Percht Skull to him.

name: Finished Cold Percht Sleigh
spoiler: Ask Frosty to upgrade a Cold Percht Sleigh Variant by delivering another Percht Skull to him.

name: Finished Dark Percht Sleigh
spoiler: Ask Frosty to upgrade a Dark Percht Sleigh Variant by delivering another Percht Skull to him.

name: Fleeting Knowledge
spoiler: Use a Library Ticket on a Flying Book.

name: Giant Beaver
spoiler: Use a Colourful Water Lily on a Giant Beaver.

name: Glooth Glider
spoiler: Obtain its 7 parts, finish 4 tasks of the Oramond Quest and then talk to NPC Peremin.

name: Gloothomotive
spoiler: Use a Wind-Up Key on a Wind-Up Loco.

name: Gnarlhound
spoiler: Use a Golem Wrench on a Modified Gnarlhound.

name: Green Rolling Barrel
spoiler: Use a Beer Tap on a Super Cask while having a Decorative Green Sheet in your inventory.

name: Gryphon
spoiler: Use The Regalia of Suon on a Gryphon while wearing a Gryphon Mask.

name: Haze
spoiler: Use a Spectral Scrap of Cloth.

name: Hibernal Moth
spoiler: Use a Purple Tendril Lantern on a Hibernal Moth.

name: Ironblight
spoiler: Use an Iron Loadstone or a Music Box on an Ironblight.

name: Kingly Deer
spoiler: Use a Golden Fir Cone or a Music Box on an Enraged White Deer.

name: Krakoloss
spoiler: Defeat Tentugly's Head during A Pirate's Tail Quest.

name: Lacewing Moth
spoiler: Use a Turquoise Tendril Lantern on a Lacewing Moth.

name: Lady Bug
spoiler: Use a Four-Leaf Clover on a Ladybug

name: Magma Crawler
spoiler: Use Glow Wine or a Music Box on a Magma Crawler.

name: Manta Ray
spoiler: Use a Foxtail on a Manta Ray.

name: Midnight Panther
spoiler: Use a Leather Whip or a Music Box on a Midnight Panther.

name: Mole
spoiler: Use a Candle Stump on a Mole.

name: Mutated Abomination
spoiler: Use the lever in the room south of Geoffray in Doctor Marrow's laboratory after defeating The Monster.

name: Neon Sparkid
spoiler: Use a Crackling Egg.

name: Noble Lion
spoiler: Use The Lion's Heart on a Noble Lion.

name: Phant
spoiler: Trade 8000 Drome points with a Tibiadrome NPC.

name: Phantasmal Jade
spoiler: Use 4 Spectral Horseshoes, a Spectral Horse Tack and a Spectral Saddle after completing the Soul War Quest.

name: Racing Bird
spoiler: Use a Carrot on a Stick on a Terror Bird.

name: Rapid Boar
spoiler: Use a Hunting Horn on a Boar.

name: Red Rolling Barrel
spoiler: Use a Beer Tap on a Super Cask while having a Decorative Red Sheet in your inventory.

name: Rift Runner
spoiler: Using a Mysterious Scroll.

name: Ripptor
spoiler: Unlock hazard level 6 in Gnomprona and request the mount to Gnomadness.

name: Scorpion King
spoiler: Use a Scorpion Sceptre on a Sandstone Scorpion.

name: Shellodon
spoiler: Deliver an Eldritch Crystal to Gnomevisor.

name: Shock Head
spoiler: Use a Nightmare Horn on a Shock Head.

name: Singeing Steed
spoiler: Use 4 Fiery Horseshoes.

name: Sparkion
spoiler: Use a Vibrant Egg.

name: Stampor
spoiler: Give 30 Hollow Stampor Hoof, 50 Stampor Horn and 100 Stampor Talons to Chondur in Meriana.

name: Stone Rhino
spoiler: Use an Astral Shaper Rune on a Stone Rhino.

name: Tamed Panda
spoiler: Use Bamboo Leaves or a Music Box on a Panda.

name: The Hellgrip
spoiler: Use a Nail Case on a Gravedigger.

name: Tiger Slug
spoiler: Use a Slug Drug on a Slug.

name: Tin Lizzard
spoiler: Use a Tin Key on a stationary Tin Lizzard.

name: Titanica
spoiler: Use a Giant Shrimp on a Crustacea Gigantica.

name: Undead Cavebear
spoiler: Use a Maxilla Maximus on an Undead Cavebear.

name: Uniwheel
spoiler: Use a Golden Can of Oil on a stationary Uniwheel.

name: Ursagrodon
spoiler: Use a Melting Horn on a Half-Frozen Ursagrodon.

name: Vortexion
spoiler: Use a Menacing Egg.

name: Walker
spoiler: Use a Control Unit on a Walker.

name: War Bear
spoiler: Use a Slingshot on a Bear.

name: War Horse
spoiler: Use Sugar Oat or a Music Box on a Wild Horse.

name: Water Buffalo
spoiler: Use Leech on a Water Buffalo.

name: White Lion
spoiler: Use a Red Silk Flower on one of the White Lions at the entrance of the Lion Sanctum.

name: Widow Queen
spoiler: Use Sweet Smelling Bait or a Music Box on a Wailing Widow.
